reviews.review: Это копия классичесного Counter-Strike, которая не привнесла ничего нового. Именно из-за отсутствия значительных перемен (а только несколько карт и крошечного улучшения графики) игра не достойна вашего внимания. Да, поскольку в этой игре все то же, она все еще может предложить все то, что и классическая часть, но ребят, надо быть адекватным и оценивать по существу.
Just finished the game again, and I enjoyed the bot chatter most :)  Good memories with this game.
Literally almost no one knows about this CS game but it's not that bad.
This game reminds me of my childhood I really like that and special thanks to valve for creating this amazing game.

Win10 1909专业64位 可玩！！正版的优势吧，为了童年的回忆补票入。本来看了一堆评论说win10不行，但是自己试了正常。

然后2大问题，其实都有人说了，
1.刚刚进图走几步就程序失去响应，   这是不支持中文输入法的原因，进去就按 大写键 或者 Ctrl+空格  关闭中文输入法就好了。
2.中文语音经常出BUG，不停的重复喊一段语音，甚至都赢了下一盘了还在喊，，，这个有个大神发现了是因为steam中文语音包BUG，替换D版的语音包就正常了，，，那个大神放了语音包替换链接，可以找找。或者删除那几个中文语音包，用原版英文的，也正常。

以上，都是我看别人说的总结，感谢这些前辈们~

Trata se de um jogo em que, na epoca, foi a maior diversão de todas. Eu ainda jogo essa versão do CS até hoje pois há muita gente da antiga jogando, e acredite, é pura alegria, a galera se gosta demais e sempre tem alguem contando um caso engraçado hahaahahahha.
O jogo é simplesmente o melhor!

Counter-Strike: Condition Zero is a reskin of Counter-Strike. The only new thing added being the missions, which quickly get very repetitive (especially if you try to 100% complete them, it's mental torture).

This is the next version after Counter-Strike 1.6. The gameplay part is completely same. We have addition of bots, single player mode, some new/revamped maps, and better player model.
Oyunu indirmeme rağmen ses hatası alıyorum.

The single player campaign (Condition Zero Deleted Scenes) gets bad rap and I can't wrap my head around why - you get a world tour of counter-terrorist missions, played in anthology fashion with each level having a self-contained little story and premise (as a bonus, you get to see all your favourite B-action movie cliches of previous century)

It also has classic level design behind it by legends who've worked on stuff like Duke Nukem, and each level is having its own unique and strong thematic feel (albeit very stereotypical, when it comes to characters' regional accents and tongue in cheek writing). Good sound design and texture work that holds up surprisingly well - just make sure to type "gl_round_down 0" console command in-game or add it to autoexec.cfg file.

You get to snipe a stealth bomber with AWP rifle - what else do you want out of life?
